text: Podvoloshino () is a rural locality (a village) in Asovskoye Rural Settlement, Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai, Russia. The population was 190 as of 2010. There are 5 streets. == Geography == It is located 8 km north-east from Asovo. == References == Category:Rural localities in Beryozovsky District, Perm Krai
title: Podvoloshino
